events.message: The applicant, Jane Doe, has submitted her application for the Software Engineer position, including her CV and cover letter demonstrating extensive experience in backend development and cloud services.
Jane Doe's application has been successfully categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords found in her resume such as 'software engineer' and 'cloud architecture'.
The recruitment team assigned recruiter Michael Smith to handle Jane Doe's candidacy for the Software Engineer role to coordinate the next steps.
Michael conducted an initial screening interview via phone with Jane Doe to review her engineering experience and confirm her interest in the software developer position.
Jane responded promptly to the screening call summary email, expressing excitement about moving forward in the interview process and willingness to complete technical assessments.
The technical interview with the engineering panel was scheduled for April 15th, 10 AM UTC, to evaluate Jane's coding skills and problem-solving approach in software development.
Jane successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge of algorithms, system design, and cloud infrastructure pertinent to the software engineer role.
Following the positive technical interview results, an HR interview was scheduled for April 17th at 2 PM UTC to discuss Jane's career goals, salary expectations, and company culture fit.
